```typescript
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
`)
info.setScore(0)
info.startCountdown(60)

let Jeff = sprites.create(img`
    . . . . . . f f f f f f . . . .
    . . . . f f e e e e f 2 f . . .
    . . . f f e e e e f 2 2 2 f . .
    . . . f e e e f f e e e e f . .
    . . . f f f f e e 2 2 2 2 e f .
    . . . f e 2 2 2 f f f f e 2 f .
    . . f f f f f f f e e e f f f .
    . . f f e 4 4 e b f 4 4 e e f .
    . . f e e 4 d 4 1 f d d e f . .
    . . . f e e e 4 d d d d f . . .
    . . . . f f e e 4 4 4 e f . . .
    . . . . . 4 d d e 2 2 2 f . . .
    . . . . . e d d e 2 2 2 f . . .
    . . . . . f e e f 4 5 5 f . . .
    . . . . . . f f f f f f . . . .
    . . . . . . . f f f . . . . . .
`, SpriteKind.Player)
Jeff.setPosition(10, 10)
Jeff.setStayInScreen(true)
controller.moveSprite(Jeff, 0, 100)

game.onUpdateInterval(1000, function() {
    let burger = sprites.createProjectileFromSide(img`
        . . . . c c c b b b b b . . . .
        . . c c b 4 4 4 4 4 4 b b b . .
        . c c 4 4 4 4 4 5 4 4 4 4 b c .
        . e 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 5 4 4 e .
        e b 4 5 4 4 5 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 b c
        e b 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 5 4 4 e
        e b b 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 b e
        . e b 4 4 4 4 4 5 4 4 4 4 b e .
        8 7 e e b 4 4 4 4 4 4 b e e 6 8
        8 7 2 e e e e e e e e e e 2 7 8
        e 6 6 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 6 c e
        e c 6 7 6 6 7 7 7 6 6 7 6 c c e
        e b e 8 8 c c 8 8 c c c 8 e b e
        e e b e c c e e e e e c e b e e
        . e e b b 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 e e .
        . . . c c c c c e e e e e . . .
    `, -100, 0)
    burger.setKind(SpriteKind.Food)
    burger.setPosition(160, randint(10, 110))
})

game.onUpdateInterval(2000, function () {
    let skull = sprites.createProjectileFromSide(img`
        ........................
        ........................
        ........................
        ..........ffff..........
        ........ff1111ff........
        .......fb111111bf.......
        .......f1111111dbf......
        ......fd1111111ddf......
        ......fd111111dddf......
        ......fd111ddddddf......
        ......fd111ddddddf......
        ......fd1dddddddbf......
        ......fd1dfbddbbff......
        ......fbddfcdbbcf.......
        .....ffffccddbfff.......
        ....fcb1bbbfcffff.......
        ....f1b1dcffffffff......
        ....fdfdf..ffffffffff...
        .....f.f.....ffffff.....
        ........................
        ........................
        ........................
        ........................
        ........................
    `, -200, 0)
    skull.setKind(SpriteKind.Enemy)
    skull.setPosition(160, randint(10, 110))
})

sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Enemy, function(sprite: Sprite, otherSprite: Sprite) {
    sprites.destroy(otherSprite)
    info.changeScoreBy(-1)
})

sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Food, function (sprite: Sprite, otherSprite: Sprite) {
    sprites.destroy(otherSprite)
    info.changeScoreBy(1)
})
```

## Part 1
Starting out, we'll need the basics!
 - Make sure to add a ``background color`` or ``background image``!
 - This time, make sure to add ``set score`` code, as we're going to have a score to get now!
 - The last thing to add is ``set countdown`` code so the game has a timer untill it ends!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  Make sure score starts at 0, and that countdown has how many seconds you want the game to last!
hint~

## Part 2
It's time to make another player! But this time we only want them to move up and down only!
 - Make sure to ``add the sprite``.
 - Set it to the left side of the screen by changing its ``position``.
 - Make it so it ``stays in the screen`` so it cant go out of bounds!
 - Lastly, make sure to add ``controls`` to it but change the parameter so the ``vy`` is the only thing that can be changed!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  The screen size on the x is 0-160, and the screen size on the y is 0-120. Remember that changing vx changes if it can be moved left and right.
hint~

## Part 3
Now you need to add a food for your player to collect to gain points!
 - It needs to spawn continuously, so make sure to add a ``On Update Interval`` code and change the time to what you like!
 - After doing that, make sure you add the ``projectile from side`` sprite and make it go left!
 - It doesnt start out as the right kind, make sure to fix that with ``set sprite kind`` code!
 - Lastly, set it's position on the right of the screen, but make the ``y`` random with ``randint`` code.

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  Remember that every 1000 in ms is 1 second! Also to make something move left the vx needs to be negative! The sprrite kinds already in the game are Food, Player, Enemy, and Projectile.
hint~

## Part 4
Now you've got a food item that appears at random! Now do the same thing but for an enemy sprite to take away score!
 - Use what you made in part 3 to make another sprite in a seperate ``on update interval``.
 - Make the enemy faster than the food so the player has to dodge it in time!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  To make a negative number faster, you want to make the number bigger! (Instead of -100, you would do -200!)
hint~

## Part 5
Almost done! Now you need to make something happen when you run into the food sprites!
 - Make sure to use ``onOverlap`` code and set it to the player running into the food!
 - After doing that, ``change the score`` by 1 to gain a point!
 - Then remember to ``destroy the food sprite`` so the player doesnt get more points than they should!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  Make sure that on overlap has player and Food types set! If it's only deleting 1 food and stopping, make sure that the "othersprite" is in the destroy so it destroys every sprite that has the kind.
hint~

## Part 6
Final step! If you play your game you notice you can get points, but not lose them! After we add this see how many points you can get in your countdown!
  - Do the same as the previous part, but check for an ``enemy type`` to overlap with now!
  - Now take away a point if the player runs into it!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  Remember to do -1 to take away points. And dont forget to destroy the enemy too!
hint~

## Completed Challenge!
Good job! You completed the challenge! Now if you're ready! You can head onto the Fourth Orange Belt Challenge!
